source_node.query: (China OR Chinese OR PRC OR "People's Republic of China") OR (macro OR macroeconomic OR macroeconomics OR economic OR economy OR growth OR GDP OR "gross domestic product") OR (trade OR trading OR exports OR imports OR trade* OR "trade balance" OR "trade policy") OR (policy OR policies OR stimulus OR "fiscal policy" OR "monetary policy" OR "economic policy") OR (commodities OR commodity OR resource OR resources OR raw materials OR metals OR energy OR oil OR gas OR agriculture) OR (global OR worldwide OR international OR foreign OR markets OR market) OR (analysis OR analyses OR report OR reports OR news OR update OR trend OR trends OR outlook OR forecast OR insight OR development OR developments)
source_node.importance_rationale: China Macro is a core macroeconomic topic that directly influences global financial markets, currency movements, commodity demand, and equity valuations. It is time-sensitive and highly actionable for intraday trading decisions.
source_node.fundamental_analysis: Major driver of global growth and commodity demand.
